Text:
The info I have been looking for for years.

Excellent,Excellent,Excellent,Excellent,Excellent.

Must read for anyone who ponders PC architecture and just can't see how it all fits together. Its great to know I'm not stupid, it really is very, very complicated.

Must read for all techis and programmers who can't live with vague answers.

A gem!!

Will buy 2nd edition, as homage to Darmawan Salihun.
